mapper.update:
update t_team_season_score
TEAM_NO = #{teamNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEAM_SHORT_NAME = #{teamShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEAGUE_NO = #{leagueNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEASON_NO = #{seasonNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEASON_NAME = #{seasonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUND = #{round,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WIN = #{win,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DRAW = #{draw,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOSE = #{lose,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOALS = #{goals,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POINTS = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RANK = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FUMBLE = #{fumble,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HOST_HAVE_MATCH = #{hostHaveMatch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HOST_WIN = #{hostWin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HOST_DRAW = #{hostDraw,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HOST_LOSE = #{hostLose,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HOST_GOALS = #{hostGoals,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HOST_FUMBLE = #{hostFumble,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HOST_POINTS = #{hostPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GUEST_HAVE_MATCH = #{guestHaveMatch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GUEST_WIN = #{guestWin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GUEST_DRAW = #{guestDraw,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GUEST_LOSE = #{guestLose,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GUEST_GOALS = #{guestGoals,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GUEST_FUMBLE = #{guestFumble,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GUEST_POINTS = #{guestPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_team_season_score set TEAM_NO = #{teamNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEAM_SHORT_NAME = #{teamShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAGUE_NO = #{leagueNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEASON_NO = #{seasonNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEASON_NAME = #{seasonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUND = #{round,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WIN = #{win,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DRAW = #{draw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LOSE = #{lose,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GOALS = #{goals,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POINTS = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RANK = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FUMBLE = #{fumble,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HOST_HAVE_MATCH = #{hostHaveMatch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HOST_WIN = #{hostWin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HOST_DRAW = #{hostDraw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HOST_LOSE = #{hostLose,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HOST_GOALS = #{hostGoals,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HOST_FUMBLE = #{hostFumble,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HOST_POINTS = #{hostPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GUEST_HAVE_MATCH = #{guestHaveMatch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GUEST_WIN = #{guestWin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GUEST_DRAW = #{guestDraw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GUEST_LOSE = #{guestLose,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GUEST_GOALS = #{guestGoals,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GUEST_FUMBLE = #{guestFumble,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GUEST_POINTS = #{guestPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select t.* from t_team_season_score t where t.season_no = #{seasonNo} and t.round = (select max(t1.ROUND) from t_team_season_score t1 where t.season_no = t1.season_no ) order by t.points desc,(t.GOALS - t.FUMBLE) desc,t.GOALS desc
